body: Please the last time I played Avicus was on October 14 2014. So I want to have a Fresh Start
body_tagged: Please the last time I played Avicus was on October 14 2014. So I want to have a Fresh Start
title: How Do I Restart All Of My Stats

replies.body: You can't restart your stats, sorry. The only way to do that is to get a dev to do it. They have the ability to do it, but I don't think they do it.
replies.body_tagged: You can't restart your stats, sorry. The only way to do that is to get a dev to do it. They have the ability to do it, but I don't think they do it.

replies.body:
Not possible, why would you want to?
If you want to start afresh, get another account.

If you want to start afresh, get another account.

replies.body: You say that like its so easy xd

replies.body:
Then why do you want a fresh start xd?
Your stats may be old but your stats will change from the way that you play in the future and will be visible. All your doing is killing your stats even more if your no longer good :P
